name: The experiment (itch) (dango07)
description:
In this horror game, you have to survive making your way through a facility set in the year 1930, where a military group has gathered all the prisoners of war and started experimenting on them to create supersoldiers. Something went wrong and now some of the subjects have escaped and started terorizing the guards. You play as a scientist who saw how inhumane people were being treated and wanted to help them, but you got caught and were about to be used as one of the test subjects for a new drug. 

The game is firstperson and is played using a mouse only. You move using mouse clicks, which correspond to each leg. There will be more instructions on how to play, in the game itself.
